reviewText: Great dad for 1 and over. Cutest little bear. Plays fine in US did machines.

I don't speak Polish, but my mother does and she's taking care of my daughter while I work.  It's cute.  I can watch it with them and I tell my mom what I think is going on and I'm usually mostly right, so it's not that bad..  I wanted it for my daughter to have some extra exposure to Polish and it seems to be working!
